inclusion_results.criterion: 1. Age 18-65 years, any gender;
inclusion_results.reason: The patient is 30 years old, which is within the age range.

inclusion_results.criterion: 2. Patients who have experienced their first symptomatic BSCM ICH within the six months before randomisation;
inclusion_results.reason: The summary does not specify if this is the patient's first symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH) or when it occurred.

inclusion_results.criterion: 3. Diagnosed with solitary BSCM through T2, GRE/T2*, or SWI MR imaging;
inclusion_results.reason: The patient has a known brainstem cavernous malformation (BSCM) confirmed by MRI.

inclusion_results.criterion: 4. ICH within or around the BSCM confirmed by CT /MR;
inclusion_results.reason: The MRI findings indicate increased blood products associated with the cavernous malformation, suggesting ICH.

inclusion_results.criterion: 5. Capable of signing an informed consent form with the accompaniment and understanding of a guardian.
inclusion_results.reason: It is assumed the patient can provide consent.

exclusion_results.criterion: 1. Cancer history;
exclusion_results.reason: There is no mention of a cancer history in the patient summary.

exclusion_results.criterion: 2. Pregnancy or lactation;
exclusion_results.reason: The patient is female but there is no indication of pregnancy or lactation.

exclusion_results.criterion: 3. Sirolimus/starch allergy;
exclusion_results.reason: The patient has an allergy to penicillins, but no mention of sirolimus/starch allergy.

exclusion_results.criterion: 4. Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score 5, respiratory failure or currently severe bleeding requiring life support treatment;
exclusion_results.reason: The patient is described as alert and interactive, with no indication of severe bleeding or respiratory failure.

exclusion_results.criterion: 5. Abnormal liver and/or kidney function (transaminase levels greater than 50, creatinine greater than 110), abnormal white blood cell/platelet counts (white blood cell count below 3.5 or above 9.5 x 109/L or exceeding normal values, platelet count below 100 or above 300);
exclusion_results.reason: The summary does not provide lab results for liver, kidney function, or blood counts.

exclusion_results.criterion: 6. History of previous immunosuppressive therapy;
exclusion_results.reason: There is no mention of previous immunosuppressive therapy in the patient summary.

exclusion_results.criterion: 7. History of prior surgical intervention for CCM;
exclusion_results.reason: The patient has no history of surgical intervention for cavernous malformation mentioned.

exclusion_results.criterion: 8. History of prior cranial radiation therapy;
exclusion_results.reason: There is no mention of prior cranial radiation therapy.

exclusion_results.criterion: 9. Familial CCM or people with multiple CCM;
exclusion_results.reason: The patient is described as having a solitary cavernous malformation.

exclusion_results.criterion: 10. Patients with concurrent acute active infections (e.g., severe bacterial, viral, or fungal infections);
exclusion_results.reason: There is no indication of any active infections in the patient summary.

exclusion_results.criterion: 11. Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus;
exclusion_results.reason: There is no mention of diabetes mellitus in the patient summary.

exclusion_results.criterion: 12. Currently participating in another clinical trial;
exclusion_results.reason: There is no indication that the patient is participating in another clinical trial.

exclusion_results.criterion: 13. Patient unwilling/unable to undergo MRI.
exclusion_results.reason: The patient underwent an MRI as part of her evaluation.

exclusion_results.criterion: 14. Co-administration of drugs affecting CYP3A4 enzymes (ketoconazole, voriconazole, itraconazole, telithromycin, clarithromycin).
exclusion_results.reason: The summary does not provide information on other medications that may affect CYP3A4.
